item.description:
Come sail on the tall ship Liberty Clipper! This beautiful 125' schooner is a replica of a 19th century clipper ship. We'll go for an evening sail on this magestic beauty, enjoy views of Boston and the harbor, and maybe even get to take a turn at the helm.

We set sail at 6pm and return at 8pm; I suggest you arrive at 5:30pm to get tickets and meet. The cost of the trip is $30 and their is a cash bar aboard. Liberty Clipper leaves from Long Wharf. Directions are available here: http://www.libertyfle.... Please purchase your tickets at the ticket booth and we will meet next to the booth until they let us walk over to the ship.

We hope to see you there.
item.name: The Boston Sailing August Meetup
